links.*: The Battle of Maldon: together with The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth
A Sense of Tales Untold: Exploring the Edges of Tolkien's Literary Canvas
A Wilderness of Dragons: Essays in Honor of Verlyn Flieger

wikitext.*:
'''Peter Grybauskas''' is an English teacher at the University of Maryland. His scholarship focuses on [[Tolkien studies]], fantasy, and medievalism.

==Books==
*[[2021]]: ''[[A Sense of Tales Untold: Exploring the Edges of Tolkien's Literary Canvas]]''
*[[2023]]: ''[[The Battle of Maldon: together with The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth]]'' (editor)

==Articles==
*[[2012]]: [[Tolkien Studies: Volume 9|''Tolkien Studies'': Volume 9]]
**"Untold Tales: Solving a Literary Dilemma"
*[[2015]]: ''Baptism of Fire: The Birth of the Modern British Fantastic in World War I''
**"'Now Often Forgotten': Gollum, the Great War, and the Last Alliance"
*[[2018]]: ''[[A Wilderness of Dragons: Essays in Honor of Verlyn Flieger]]''
**"'Green Hill Country': A Scholar's Tale"
*[[2020]]: [[Tolkien Studies: Volume 17|''Tolkien Studies'': Volume 17]]
**"A Portrait of the Poet as a Young Man: Noteworthy Omission in ''The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth Beorhthelm's Son''"
